thread.title: Fox News to Launch Streaming-Video Service With Opinion Fare

author: Austen Hufford
title: Fox News to Launch Streaming-Video Service With Opinion Fare

organizations.name: fox news to launch streaming-video service with opinion fare fox news

text:
Fox News said it is launching a streaming-video service aimed at the news channel’s biggest fans, the latest move by a media company to seek growth outside of traditional cable TV.
Fox News’s new service, called Fox Nation, will air opinion programming available only to subscribers, including live daily content and longer form fare.
